channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 16th July
item.description:
Abrupt Level Difference FW 300mm x 200mm x 35mm Give and take TM With Temporary FW Closure Outside Williams of Winchcombe Stats Required MAKE SAFE ONLY enquiry will be raised for AHR (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 16th July
item.description:
Damaged or part missing ACO channel. Will be made safe on temporary repair. Can you please pass on to the relevant AHR to arrange full repair or reinstatement.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 16th July
